task: Explore the word of the day feature
Additional Info: Modify Step 2: Locate 'Word of the Day' section by navigating to the 'Explore' dropdown menu on the homepage

task: Watch a live game stream on ESPN without a subscription
Additional Info: Step 5: Use Incognito mode or clear browser cookies to bypass subscription requirement

task: Find a recipe for Chocolate Cake that requires no baking and can be made in under 10 minutes on Allrecipes

steps.1: Type 'Chocolate Cake' in the search bar
steps.3: Scroll through the results to find a 'No-Bake Chocolate Cake' recipe
steps.4: Click on the recipe to view the details
steps.5: Check the preparation time to ensure it can be made in under 10 minutes
steps.6: Read user reviews to ensure it has a good rating

task: Find a recipe for vegetarian lasagna with over 50 reviews and a rating of at least 4.6 stars on Allrecipes.
Find a recipe for chocolate chip cookies with more than 500 reviews and a rating of at least 4.8 stars suitable for 12 people on Allrecipes
Find a popular Macaroni and Cheese recipe with over 1000 reviews and a rating above 4 stars. Add the necessary ingredients to a shopping list on Allrecipes

steps.1: Search for 'Macaroni and Cheese' in the search bar
steps.2: Filter the search results to show recipes with over 1000 reviews
steps.3: Select a recipe with a rating above 4 stars
steps.4: View the ingredients list of the selected recipe
steps.5: Click on 'Add to Shopping List' for each ingredient
steps.6: Ensure all necessary ingredients are added to the shopping list
steps.7: Review the shopping list to confirm all items are included

task: Find a recipe for a vegetarian lasagna that has at least a four-star rating and uses zucchini on Allrecipes

steps.1: Type 'vegetarian lasagna' in the search bar
steps.3: Filter the search results for recipes with at least a four-star rating
steps.4: Look for recipes that include zucchini as an ingredient
steps.5: Select a vegetarian lasagna recipe that meets the criteria
steps.6: Read through the recipe ingredients and instructions
steps.7: Note down the ingredients and steps or take a screenshot for reference
